title: ENA Datafile Description
description: Definitions for elements that appear in different stages of a wizard targeted at submissions to the ENA (European Nucleotide Archive) repository. 'ref', id of stage; 'title',  header used for the stage; items, actual form elements on the page; 'apply_to_all', if all items must have same value for this stage;

properties.title: Study Details
properties.message: Please add some details to better describe this study.

items.help_tip: Enter a short name for the study. Default value set from bundle information.
items.label: Name

items.help_tip: Enter a short descriptive title for the study. Default value set from profile information.
items.label: Title

items.help_tip: Enter a long description of the scope of the study. Default value set from profile information.
items.label: Description

items.help_tip:
Please specify when you want this study to be made publicly available.
Your submission might be instantly released to the public if a date in the past is specified.
items.label: Release date

properties.title: Sample
properties.message: Select and associate a sample to files in the bundle. A Sample defines an isolate of sequenceable material upon which sequencing experiments has been based.

items.help_tip: Specify the sample you used in your study
items.label: Sample

properties.title: Library Preparation
properties.message: Specify the origin of the material that may have been sequenced, and any treatments that the material might have undergone that affect the sequencing result.

items.help_tip: Specify whether to expect single, paired, or other configuration of reads
items.label: Library layout

items.help_tip: Select the sequencing technique intended for this library
items.label: Library strategy

items.help_tip: Select the sequencing technique intended for this library
items.label: Library source

items.help_tip: Select the method that was used to select for or against, enrich, or screen the material being sequenced
items.label: Library selection

items.help_tip: Specify the sequencing instrument model and make.
items.label: Sequencing Instrument
